doc.title: Infinite Sadness
doc.plot: Infinite Sadness is the story of one man's breakdown as he copes with the loss of the love of his life. It is a story of love, death, desperation and ultimately loneliness. Infinite Sadness addresses one man's attempt at ultimate salvation and escape from insurmountable heartbreak. Vincent (John Bevilacqua) is haunted by images of his lost love Robbie (Robbie Shaw). In order to escape the Infinite Sadness, he turns to heroin, which ultimately leads to his demise.
